allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Solana Snake Game - watch your tokens come alive

A fun snake game where wallet tokens become snakes that grow/shrink
based on real-time price movements. Features:
- Multi-snake arena with all wallet tokens
- Real-time price updates from Jupiter API
- Playable controls \(arrow keys/WASD\)
- Leaderboard showing token performance
- Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
EOF
\)")
